item.title: Top 10 ranking in game
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

How will you do it with this ?

if(totalz >= server.Rank19 && totalz < server.Rank18)
{
playerRank = 19;
server.Rank19 = totalz;
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 04:49:11 am[/size][hr]I don’t help i get a error at )) now…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 04:57:31 am[/size][hr]HEY! answer please…!

item.title: Top 10 ranking in game
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Add ‘)’ at the end of the if statement, for example it would look like this; ‘rank8))’, That should fix it.

item.description:

playerLevel[24] = totalz;
playerLevel[22] = playerRank;

if(totalz >= server.Rank1)
{
playerRank = 1;
server.Rank1 = totalz;
}

{
